mapper.insert: insert into coupon(coupon_num, coupon_name, discount) values(#{couponNum}, #{couponName}, #{discount})
mapper.select: select coupon_num, coupon_name, discount from coupon
select coupon_num, coupon_name, discount from coupon where coupon_num = #{couponNum}
mapper.update: update coupon set coupon_name = #{couponName}, discount = #{discount} where coupon_num = #{couponNum}
mapper.insert: insert into member_coupon(coupon_num, member_num, coupon_start, coupon_expire, emp_num) values(#{couponNum}, #{memberNum}, #{couponStart}, #{couponExpire}, #{empNum})
